archimate:DataObject.name: Issuer Public Key
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The special type of cryptographic key required for an Issuer to issue a Credential that supports Zero Knowledge Proofs. In Sovrin Infrastructure, the Issuer Public Key is published in the Credential Definition.
